title: Create a New Class
lead: Create a class with AI-generated situational questions that analyze student responses using the CASEL 5 framework.

popup.title: How it works:
popup.p1: After entering class details, our AI will generate a short scenario with a question. You can review and regenerate if needed before creating the class.
popup.li1: AI generates a short situational scenario (~50 words)
popup.li2: It creates an open-ended question for students
popup.li3: Student responses will be analyzed using the CASEL 5 framework
popup.li4: You’ll receive detailed reports on each student’s social-emotional competencies
